text: Yes, yes and yes. I am proud of my brand but round necked blokes T-shirts make me look like the middle aged woman I am (but striving not to look like!). A longer walk to work is making me appreciate trainers more but I don't feel 'me' in them. https://t.co/FXbxNa1Bmt

author.description: Friend, wife, daughter, sister, & VP Engineering at @PersonioHR . My opinions are very much that..... just mine, not theirs!
author.name: Nicola Hills
